style: Ultra-realistic, cinematic live-action. No stylization or animated aesthetics. Lighting is sharp, cool, and clinical. The mood walks the line between high-concept sci-fi and absurdist comedy. directed with grounded, photoreal texture.

shot.composition: A variety of shots will be used to capture the action: wide shots to establish the setting, medium shots to focus on the scientist, close-ups to emphasize emotions and reactions, and over-the-shoulder shots to create a sense of intimacy.  The lens will be a combination of 24mm, 50mm and 85mm prime lenses. Mount height will vary depending on the shot but generally at eye-level to enhance realism. Coverage will be extensive to ensure optimal editing flexibility.
shot.camera_motion: Smooth dolly moves to follow the scientist, handheld shots during the portal activation for a sense of immediacy, and static shots for detailed observation of the characters.
shot.film_grain: Fine grain, subtle, and consistent throughout

timeline.action: Wide shot establishing the laboratory, showcasing the portal and its surroundings. The scientist is shown entering from the back of the lab
Medium shot following the scientist walking toward the portal, his excitement is palpable. His breathing is heavy. He is speaking in an excited and somewhat manic tone.
Close-up on the scientist's face as he makes his announcement: “It has finally been done! We have made... ANIME CAT GIRLS!!”. His hands are raised high in excitement.
Extreme close-up on the portal, showing energy arcs and the reactor pulsing.  A sudden surge of energy cracks the surface of the reactor core.
A wide shot captures the cat girl leaping through the portal, landing gracefully in the lab. The camera emphasizes the realism of her form.
Close-up on the cat girl’s face, observing her reactions. She turns her gaze toward the scientist, offering a simple “Meow”.

Senior Scientist.appearance: Tall, slender build. White, tousled hair, wire-rimmed glasses, perfectly clean lab coat but somewhat disheveled.
Senior Scientist.physics: Human-like locomotion. Excited demeanor. Noticeably trembling hands.

Cat Girl.appearance: Young woman with realistic pink hair, subtle surgically-augmented feline ears, and a form-fitting opaque bodysuit. Her movements should appear extremely fluid and athletic.  Visually striking, detailed appearance.
Cat Girl.physics: Agile, athletic movement, enhanced human-like. Lands smoothly after traversing the portal.

scene.location: A pristine high-tech laboratory with metallic panels, transparent digital interfaces glowing on the walls, and sleek countertops holding surgical instruments and vials of glowing blue liquid.
scene.atmosphere: Sterile environment, low electronic hum from the reactor, the sounds of footsteps echoing in the large room.  A controlled burst of energy from the portal will emit electrical crackling sounds.

lighting.primary: Cool-toned blue and white fluorescent lighting supplemented by subtle backlighting on metallic surfaces.
lighting.secondary: Accent lighting on the portal, emphasizing its pulsating energy field. This helps to draw attention to the center of the action and increases the sense of dramatic tension.

audio.ambient: Low electronic thrumming from the reactor, rising to a crescendo during the portal activation then settling down afterward.  Sound of sparking energy in the background.

color_palette.mode: Realistic, with a subtle cool blue tint
color_palette.notes: Sharply saturated colors, primarily in cool blues, whites and accented with the vibrant pink of the catgirl.  Use of color grading for a visually impressive effect, without compromising the film’s realistic aesthetic

prohibited_elements: Obvious visual effects artifacts, jarring camera movements, and any elements that detract from the realism of the scene.
required_elements: The detailed realism of the cat girl, the advanced technology in the lab, the dramatic portal activation sequence, and the overall high-production-value aesthetic.
